text: Ok, I took a moment during the lab and after to think through this idea and how to articulate it. I also used @AnthropicAI's @claudeai101 and @lexdotpage to refine it bit by bit. Asking my colleagues and friends @_buildspace @_nightsweekends s5 to give it their reax. https://t.co/coBm3sSeTb
